entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 04:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %

Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
